function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High temperature incineration can release air pollutants and greenhouse gases","Impact":"Health risks from air pollution and contribution to climate change","Mitigation":"Use emission control technologies to minimize air pollutants and greenhouse gas emissions","Technologies":"Emission control technologies, such as scrubbers and filters","People":"Hospital staff, nearby residents, and the environment","Owner":"Hospital management, environmental regulators"},{"Description":"Improper handling of explosive and radioactive waste in incineration can lead to safety hazards","Impact":"Risk of explosions, radioactive contamination, and harm to workers and the environment","Mitigation":"Strict protocols for handling and separate disposal methods for explosive and radioactive waste","Technologies":"Shielding and containment systems for radioactive waste, safe disposal methods for explosive waste","People":"Hospital staff, waste management personnel, and the environment","Owner":"Hospital management, waste management personnel"},{"Description":"Improper waste preparation and incineration processes can result in incomplete destruction of pathogens","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases from improperly treated waste","Mitigation":"Implement stringent waste segregation and proper incineration processes, monitor and test for pathogen destruction","Technologies":"High temperature steam disinfection, monitoring and testing equipment for pathogen destruction","People":"Hospital staff, waste management personnel, and the wider community","Owner":"Hospital management, waste management personnel"}]}
